title: Who are some great guitarist who learned to play late in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know that he was a “great guitarist”, but I’ll pick Leonard Cohen. Cohen claimed late in life that his entire musical output was based on six chords he learned from a Spanish flamenco player over a few lessons when he was a teenager. Cohen didn’t start any career as a musician until he was in his early 30s. And look what he did with those six chords. . .
